product_name: Merrell Siren Soft-Shell Hoodie - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Heading out in blustery conditions? The Merrell Siren Soft-Shell hoodie is a great choice for outdoor adventures thanks to its warm, wind-blocking and weather-resistant fabric. AeroBlock(TM) soft-shell fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed light moisture. Bonded fleece on inner-facing of jacket, high collar and hood is soft against skin, and enhances warmth. Zippered hand pockets; drawcord hem. Closeout.
short_description: Heading out in blustery conditions? The Merrell Siren Soft-Shell hoodie is a great choice for outdoor adventures thanks to its warm, wind-blocking and weather-resistant fabric.
